values: Still is used when you say that a situation keeps going on.
They are still waiting in line to get tickets.
ad
v. 更；仍然；静止地

vi. 蒸馏；平静；静止比较级:stiller, stillest

Still means to remain in the same position or state without changing.
adjective, noun, adverb, verb
not moving or making a sound; continuing to be active or in existence.
寂静
